Reviews.Title: This is a Great! Windows PC 2-in-1 Deal!
Reviews.Author: PAS
Reviews.Content: For the price of a 128 Gig Surface Pro, it has the brain of a Surface Pro 2,  a well made keyboard, and a touch screen two.  The look and feel of the whole unit are of precision high quality manufacture and it came in at $595 with no shipping, it was a super deal!  My hands are not huge, but my fingers always miss keys on the smaller keyboards, that issue is resolved with this tiny bit bigger unit.

Reviews.Title: A suitable product for those who like using keyboard.
Reviews.Author: Gyan Sinha
Reviews.Content: I like this product. Slim laptop with detachable monitor and touch screen. It is like all good things in one.

ProductInfo.Features:
4th Gen Intel Core i3-4020Y Mobile Processor with Intel HD Graphics 4200
13.3" touch screen for hands-on control
4GB Memory / 128GB solid state drive / No DVD/CD drive
Front-facing HP TrueVision HD webcam with 2 noise-canceling microphones
Windows 8 / Weighs 4.9 lbs. and measures 0.9" thin overall
ProductInfo.Name: HP Split x2 13-m210dx 2-in-1 13.3" TouchScreen Laptop PC
